tweet: I never attempt to make money on the stock market. I buy on the assumption that they could close the market the next day
Risk is a part of God's game, alike for men and nations.
I always knew I was going to be rich. I don't think I ever doubted it for a minute.
It should be clear to most everyone that the business of Wall Street brokerage firms is to make money.Not necessary to make YOU money !
I've learned that mistakes can often be as good a teacher as success.
